name: Treasure Seeker (0.3d)
description:
(Treasure Seeker is in heavy development, is not complete, and will feature bugs)

INTRODUCTION

 

To the left, the right, or straight ahead...

Make a fast path through the dungeon floors, improvising with what is revealed before you, fighting enemies before the light runs out...
Use items and collect Artifacts to complete your collection of material rarities, And be the worthy representative of your title...
Treasure Seeker!

 

HOW TO PLAY

In the Dungeon, 3 (or more...) options will stand before you. Pick the option of your choice to progress in your Journey, and collect the best items to come back home alive!
Gather Gold to buy new items, and Knowledge to become stronger with Upgrades. Find Artifacts to complete your collection of Treasures. Be careful in your Journey as if the light runs out, or if you are mortally wounded, you won't be able to bring all of your loot home. So pick up what you can, and find an Exit before it's too late!

 

CONTROLS
(arrow keys and num pad recommended for Keyboard)

F2 : Toggle FPS
F3 : Adapt Screen to Window Size
F4 : Toggle Fullscreen
F5 : Reset



If your controller is not detected, press X (Xbox) or Square (Playstation) once in game.
